Desc.entry: Annual community event incorporating competition classes for arts and crafts, domestic produce, flowers, garden produce, art, woodwork, sculpture, metalwork, photography and children sections. Entry forms are available from Rosie's, Totley Post Office, Totley Library and on the website. Usually held on the 3rd weekend in September at Totley Primary School. Show judging is followed by an auction of donated produce.

Pubs.entry: Show programme; Totley Independent, monthly magazine
